Class RegExpPathMacros

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathMacros

    public class RegExpPathMacros
extends BasePathMacros
    Regular expression path macro. Matches paths using regular expressions.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public boolean init(java.lang.String actionPath,
                    java.lang.String[] separators)
        Description copied from class: BasePathMacros
        Initializes PathMacro and returns true if macros are found in the action path. Otherwise, returns false and the instance can be thrown away.

        Separators is array of 3 strings that defines: start, dividing string, and end of a macro.

        Specified by:
        init in interface PathMacros
        Overrides:
        init in class BasePathMacros

      • matchValue

        protected boolean matchValue(int macroIndex,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from class: BasePathMacros
        Matches the stripped value with the pattern. Pattern at provided macroIndex is not null!
        Specified by:
        matchValue in class BasePathMacros
